name: Task Donegeon - 0.0.47
lastChange: Corrected dynamic date display in documentation. Reorganized the main sidebar for better clarity, grouping all administrative pages under a single 'Administration' section and user-centric pages under 'Character'.
description: A gamified task and chore tracker for families and groups. Complete quests, earn currency and experience, and level up your character in a fun, medieval-themed adventure.
